statements: UPDATE SecurityEventLogs SET event_type = 'Login' WHERE event_id = 1;
UPDATE SecurityEventLogs SET ip_address = '192.168.1.100', user_id = 101 WHERE event_id = 2;
UPDATE SecurityEventLogs SET event_type='Login', timestamp='2023-09-15 08:30:00', user_id=1001, ip_address='192.168.1.10' WHERE event_id=1;
UPDATE SecurityEventLogs SET ip_address='10.10.10.10', event_type='Logout', timestamp='2023-09-16 10:45:00', user_id=2002 WHERE event_id=2;
UPDATE security_events SET event_description = 'New description' WHERE event_id = 1;
UPDATE database_logs SET log_message = 'Error encountered' WHERE log_id = 100;
UPDATE security_events SET event_type='Login', event_timestamp='2022-10-15 09:30:00', event_description='Successful login' WHERE event_id=100;
UPDATE database_logs SET log_message='Database error occurred', log_timestamp='2022-10-16 15:45:00', log_source='Production' WHERE log_id=50;
UPDATE SecurityEvents SET event_type = 'Login' WHERE event_id = 123;
UPDATE IncidentResponse SET incident_resolved = true WHERE incident_id = 456;
UPDATE SecurityEvents SET event_description = 'Unauthorized access detected' WHERE event_id = 1002;
UPDATE IncidentResponse SET incident_resolved = TRUE, incident_type = 'Data Breach' WHERE incident_id = 5001;
UPDATE security_events SET event_type = 'Login' WHERE event_id = 1;
UPDATE database_logs SET log_time = '2022-04-15 10:30:00' WHERE log_id = 2;
UPDATE security_events SET event_type = 'Unauthorized Access' WHERE event_id = 100;
UPDATE database_logs SET log_description = 'Database maintenance scheduled for next week' WHERE log_id = 50;
UPDATE SecurityEvents SET event_type = 'Login Attempt' WHERE event_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
UPDATE IncidentParticipants SET participant_role = 'Analyst', participant_contact = 'analyst@example.com' WHERE participant_name = 'John Doe';
UPDATE SecurityEvents SET event_type = 'Login', event_description = 'User logged in successfully' WHERE event_id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789abc';
UPDATE IncidentManagement SET incident_type = 'Data Breach', incident_description = 'Sensitive data exposed' WHERE incident_id = '87654321-4321-4321-4321-0987654321cba';
